conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a successful isometric cutaway with clear 3D geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation; consistent wall thickness and clean cutaway logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and adjacencies are highly accurate. Minor window/door omissions on the far side walls.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed and logical; bathroom/laundry fixtures are somewhat simplified but present.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering; the car and garage represent the layout well.

detected_errors.description: Windows on the right/back walls are not visible or rendered.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity to the original floor plan with clean isometric aesthetics.
